REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1895 reute r f BC-SUMMIT-ENERGY-<SUM>-E 03-16 0059

TEXT.TITLE: SUMMIT ENERGY <SUM> EXTENDS EXCHANGE OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Summit Energy Inc said it has extended to April Three from March 13 its offer to exchange six common shares for each of its 569,200 outstanding shares of 1.80 dlr cumulative convertible preferred stock. The company said through Friday it had received 302,669 of the shares or 53.2 pct. Reuter
